summary: A retexture of the gold septim, just for fun.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/65163/?][img]http://i.imgur.com/QtD7v94.png[/img][/url][/center]

Hello everybody! This little retexture turns the default gold coin into a golden bitcoin... [i]coin.[/i]


[color=#1E90FF][size=5]== WHAT ==[/size][/color]
A retexture of the vanilla gold Septim to look like a bitcoin, default resolution (512x256). Custom normal map included. It gets a really pretty reflective effect when viewed in the inventory.


[color=#1E90FF][size=5]== WHY ==[/size][/color]
Because I've been sick for several days and needed something fun to work on. That's all there is to it. Kapow!


[color=#1E90FF][size=5]== HOW ==[/size][/color]
To install, extract the contents of your downloaded file to your [font=Courier New]"Steam/SteamApps/Common/Skyrim/Data" [/font]folder. That's it, no esp needed. To uninstall, simply delete the files from your Data folder, and you're good to go. Have fun!

[center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/games/users/donate/?mode=straight&id=2543917][img]http://i.imgur.com/V6qmsU9.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/UJ12AJk.png[/img][/center]
author: Jokerine
